Class: Resize

ImagerJs.plugins. Resize

new Resize(imagerInstance, options)

Resize plugin. Provides a control which allows to to resize an image.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
imagerInstance
options Object Resize square control options.
Properties
Name Type Description
controlsCss Object Css properties that will be applied to resizing controls.
controlsTouchCss Object Css properties that will be applied to resizing controls when on touch device.
doubleDiff Boolean Doubles mouse pointer distance. This is needed when image is centered while resizing to make resize corner be always under mouse cursor.
Source:
  • plugins/resize/Resize.js, line 25

Methods

calcAspectRatio(srcWidth, srcHeight, maxWidth, maxHeight) → {Object}

Conserve aspect ratio of the orignal region. Useful when shrinking/enlarging images to fit into a certain area.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
srcWidth Number Source area width
srcHeight Number Source area height
maxWidth Number Fittable area maximum available width
maxHeight Number Fittable area maximum available height
Source:
  • plugins/resize/Resize.js, line 146
Returns:
{ width, heigth }
Type
Object
